bug.author: ssamot
bug.description: Hello - it seems that <denchmark-link:agents/n_step_q_agent.py>agents/n_step_q_agent.py</denchmark-link> uses xrange instead of range - I guess this is a bug?

comments.comment: You are right, this is a bug. We will push a fix. Thanks!
should be fixed in the latest release <denchmark-link:https://github.com/IntelLabs/coach/commit/125c7ee38d413e4709271292c473f5930196b137>125c7ee</denchmark-link>
